mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHEAT (ctno, title, gubun, region, occurday, buyprice, cheatid, cheattel, cheatemail, cnt, content, email, tel, userid, nickname, passwd, thumb, file1, size1, file2, size2, file3, size3, file4, size4, file5, size5) VALUES ((SELECT NVL(MAX(ctno), 0)+1 as ctno FROM cheat) ,#{title}, #{gubun}, #{region}, #{occurday}, #{buyprice}, #{cheatid}, #{cheattel}, #{cheatemail} , 0, #{content}, #{email}, #{tel}, #{userid}, #{nickname}, #{passwd}, #{thumb}, #{file1}, #{size1}, #{file2}, #{size2}, #{file3}, #{size3}, #{file4}, #{size4}, #{file5}, #{size5})
mapper.select: SELECT ctno, title, gubun, region, occurday, buyprice, cheatid, cheattel, cheatemail, cnt, content, email, tel, userid, nickname, passwd, wdate, thumb, file1, size1, file2, size2, file3, size3, file4, size4, file5, size5 FROM cheat WHERE CTNO = #{ctno}

SELECT count(ctno) as cnt FROM cheat
WHERE title LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%'
WHERE content LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%'
WHERE title LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%' OR content LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%'

SELECT ctno, title, gubun, region, occurday, buyprice, cheatid, cheattel, cheatemail, cnt, content, email, tel, userid, nickname, passwd, wdate, thumb, file1, size1, file2, size2, file3, size3, file4, size4, file5, size5, r FROM( SELECT ctno, title, gubun, region, occurday, buyprice, cheatid, cheattel, cheatemail, cnt, content, email, tel, userid, nickname, passwd, wdate, thumb, file1, size1, file2, size2, file3, size3, file4, size4, file5, size5, rownum as r FROM( SELECT ctno, title, gubun, region, occurday, buyprice, cheatid, cheattel, cheatemail, cnt, content, email, tel, userid, nickname, passwd, wdate, thumb, file1, size1, file2, size2, file3, size3, file4, size4, file5, size5 FROM cheat
WHERE title LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%'
WHERE content LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%'
WHERE title LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%' OR content LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%'
ORDER BY ctno desc ) ) WHERE r >=#{startNum} AND r <= #{endNum}
